rows.label: qst201313_msg0001
rows.name:
You know Maqqa? Helping out with the
search, are you? Sorry, but I don't have
anything new to tell you.

rows.label: qst201313_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought the kids were just going
to play nearby, like they usually do...
Did they wander off too far, maybe?

rows.label: qst201313_msg0003
rows.name:
Even if they did, what happened to
them out there? A monster attack?
Or were they just spirited away?

rows.label: qst201313_msg0004
rows.name:
Ohhhh, why didn't I keep a closer
eye on my daughter...?
